participant_1.name: Linda
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and a bit clumsy, always trying to make the best of every situation.
participant_1.background: I'm the one always tripping over my own two feet while running track. I think I should bake my grandson some chocolate cake for his birthday. I love to eat shrimp and lobster. I took a vacation to visit my poppa and play with his train set. My favorite tv show is Game of Thrones.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and creative, with a strong love for animals and storytelling.
participant_2.background: My dogs are my best friends and I want to learn how to be a better dog owner. I'm almost finished with my degree. I don't mind the rain, because it helps me drown out my terrible singing voice. I am a writer, and I use my solitude to my creative advantage. I just got back from a walk with my dog, and I'm looking forward to teaching her some new tricks!

content.text: Hi! What are your favorite ways to spend free time?
I love playing with my dogs and writing!
That's awesome! What do you like to write about?
All sorts of things. I'm a writer and I use my solitude to my creative advantage.
That's so cool! Do you have any books published?
Not yet, but I'm working on it! I'm almost finished with my degree in writing.
Oh that's awesome! What kind of degree are you getting?
I'm getting a degree in English with a concentration in creative writing.
That's really cool! I'm sure you'll do great things with it.
Thanks! I'm excited to see what the future holds.
Me too! What are your goals for the future?
I want to be a successful writer and I want to have a family.
Those are both great goals! I'm sure you'll accomplish them.
You're welcome! Good luck with everything!
